action.action-desc: Ms. Scholten (for herself and Ms. Mace) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase civil penalties related to child labor.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Justice for Exploited Children Act of 2023.

section.header: Civil penalties related to child labor

subsection.text: Section 16(e)(1)(A) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 (29 U.S.C. 216(e)(1)(A)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking not to exceed— and inserting as follows:;
by moving the margins for clauses (i) and (ii) 4 ems to the left;

subparagraph.text: by striking $11,000 and inserting Not less than $5,000 but not more than $132,270; and
by striking ; or and inserting a period; and

paragraph.text: in clause (ii), by striking $50,000 and inserting Not less than $25,000 but not more than $601,150.

subsection.text: The amendments in subsection (a) shall be applicable to violations occurring on or after the date of enactment of this section.
